x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A citywide portal showing live availability of beds, blood units, oxygen, and ambulances with workflows to book & confirm. Below are some ServiceNow capabilities that could be used:

  • Service Portal, CSM/Case Management
  • Various ServiceNow tables (hospital/blood bank inventory tables,etc)
  • IntegrationHub (hospital APIs, tracking progress of items)
  • Notifications
  • Performance Analytics

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Could be some like Hospital inventory APIs, Ambulance tracking.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Data freshness and continuous updating, surge in demand and supply during crises.
